about_the_game:
Map

The Airport Map DLC lets you take your FPV drone to a bustling airport. Fly through runways, hangars, and control towers, dodging obstacles and navigating tight spaces. With realistic physics and stunning visuals, every flight feels like the real thing.

Discover hidden areas and shortcuts as you test your skills, whether you're a beginner or an expert pilot. The Airport Map offers endless fun and thrills for everyone!

Challenges

The DLC includes four challenges, with two challenges for regular drones and two for micro drones. Collect ORQA coins while mastering tricky obstacle courses. Take off and conquer the skies!
detailed_description:
Map

The Airport Map DLC lets you take your FPV drone to a bustling airport. Fly through runways, hangars, and control towers, dodging obstacles and navigating tight spaces. With realistic physics and stunning visuals, every flight feels like the real thing.

Discover hidden areas and shortcuts as you test your skills, whether you're a beginner or an expert pilot. The Airport Map offers endless fun and thrills for everyone!

Challenges

The DLC includes four challenges, with two challenges for regular drones and two for micro drones. Collect ORQA coins while mastering tricky obstacle courses. Take off and conquer the skies!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (2GB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably a transmitter radio is wanted for best flying experience. Graphic settings are changeable to suit lower end devices.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably a transmitter radio is wanted for best flying experience. Graphic settings are changeable to suit lower end devices.

name: FPV SkyDive - Airport

  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (2GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably a transmitter radio is wanted for best flying experience. Graphic settings are changeable to suit lower end devices.

short_description: The Airport Map DLC lets you fly through runways, hangars, and control towers in a realistic airport setting. Complete challenges, collect unique items, and test your skills in an exciting, immersive environment. Perfect for pilots of all levels!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
